venue.name: Todd Morsilli Clay Court Tennis Center, ROGER WILLIAMS PARK

item.description:
TENNIS 201:

Enjoy this fun filled 90 minute class that will further develop your strokes and increase your consistency.  Introduction to cardio tennis elements.  Develop a serve and return of serve.

TENNIS 301:

Add spin and pace to your shots.  learn specialty strokes.  Tactical strategy introduced.  Cardio tennis drills, games based drills, competitive play.

This is a fun and friendly class.  You will meet others who share your interest and desire to improve their tennis.

You may sign up for this class on both Tuesdays and Thursdays (recommended) or sign up for just one day each week.    6:30 - 8:00 pm.

If weather is an isssue, please call 401-749-1072. The voice message will indicate whether class is cancelled.  All cancelled classes may be made up at a later session.

 

This class meets for 10 weeks and costs either $300 or $150 depending upon whether you play once or twice each week.

 

Note: Players may borrow rackets from SPOT during their lessons.
item.how_to_find_us: Next to Zoo in Roger Williams Park or enter 100 Hawthorne St Providence, RI 02907 in GPS.
item.name: Tennis 201/301 Class
